about.title: Hi! I'm Hernán Marrapodi
about.description:
I am a software developer with a passion for creating Web and Mobile applications.
I have experience in a variety of technologies including Java, JavaScript, Spring, Angular and React.
I enjoy learning and researching the nitty-gritty details about how things are coded or implemented.
